title: Did the Counter-Narcotics Commission report on the "majority" of persons who had contracted COVID-19 protective masks?
subtitle: United States President Donald Trump further misunderstood when he claimed on live television that "85 per cent of people wearing masks hold [COVID-19].
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: A study conducted by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention found that the overwhelming majority of individuals infected with the Corona virus were wearing masks or facial cover, which proves that neither of them was effective in preventing the spread of the Corona-19 virus.
